alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Latimer (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 10:04PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Haskell, northeastern Latimer and northern Le Flore Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 1003 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles southeast of Mccurtain to Lequire. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Spiro... Panama... Wister... Keota... Red Oak... Mccurtain... Bokoshe... Fanshawe... Cameron... Mc Curtain... Lequire... Shady Point... Cowlington... Summerfield... Milton... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for west central Arkansas...and southeastern Oklahoma.
